IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: THE MISSION OF NEVADA COMMUNITY FOUNDATION IS TO RECEIVE AND ACCEPT FUNDS TO BE ADMINISTERED AND DISBURSED THROUGH GRANTS EXCLUSIVELY FOR CHARITABLE PURPOSES PRIMARILY IN NEVADA OR FOR THE BENEFIT OF RESIDENTS OF NEVADA. THE FOUNDATION'S MISSION IS TO MATCH DONORS' PHILANTHROPIC INTERESTS WITH THE MYRIAD NEEDS OF THE COMMUNITY. THE FOUNDATION PRIMARILY RECEIVES ITS REVENUE FROM DONORS IN THE SOUTHERN NEVADA REGION.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE MISSION OF NEVADA COMMUNITY FOUNDATION IS TO RECEIVE AND ACCEPT FUNDS TO BE ADMINISTERED AND DISBURSED THROUGH GRANTS EXCLUSIVELY FOR CHARITABLE PURPOSES PRIMARILY IN NEVADA OR FOR THE BENEFIT OF RESIDENTS OF NEVADA. THE FOUNDATION'S MISSION IS TO MATCH DONORS' PHILANTHROPIC INTERESTS WITH THE MYRIAD NEEDS OF THE COMMUNITY. THE FOUNDATION PRIMARILY RECEIVES ITS REVENUE FROM DONORS IN THE SOUTHERN NEVADA REGION.
IRS990.Description: THE PRIMARY PROGRAM EXPENSE OF THE FOUNDATION CONSISTS OF ITS DIRECT FINANCIAL SUPPORT OF OTHER CHARITIES AND CHARITABLE CAUSES. OTHER SUBSTANTIAL ACTIVITIES CLASSIFIED AS PROGRAM EXPENDITURES INCLUDE THE CONVENING OF CHARITIES TO EXAMINE DIFFERENT COMMUNITY ISSUES, THE CREATION AND PUBLICATION OF EDUCATIONAL AND RESOURCE MATERIALS, TECHNICAL AND ORGANIZATIONAL CONSULTING ASSISTANCE TO CHARITIES, AND PUBLIC EDUCATION EFFORTS DESIGNED TO RAISE THE LEVEL OF CHARITABLE GIVING FOR THE BROAD BENEFIT OF ALL NONPROFITS IN NEVADA.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS INSIDE THE UNITED STATES
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: FOR GRANTS OF 10,000 OR MORE, NEVADA COMMUNITY FOUNDATION GENERALLY DRAWS UP A GRANT AGREEMENT THAT REQUIRES THE CHARITY TO REPORT ON HOW THE MONIES WERE SPENT AND THE IMPACT OF THE GRANT.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE MISSION OF NEVADA COMMUNITY FOUNDATION IS TO RECEIVE AND ACCEPT FUNDS TO BE ADMINISTERED AND DISBURSED THROUGH GRANTS EXCLUSIVELY FOR CHARITABLE PURPOSES PRIMARILY IN NEVADA OR FOR THE BENEFIT OF RESIDENTS OF NEVADA. THE FOUNDATION'S MISSION IS TO MATCH DONORS' PHILANTHROPIC INTERESTS WITH THE MYRIAD NEEDS OF THE COMMUNITY. THE FOUNDATION PRIMARILY RECEIVES ITS REVENUE FROM DONORS IN THE SOUTHERN NEVADA REGION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FORM 990 WAS LISTED AS A SEPARATE ITEM ON THE BOARD AGENDA. A COPY OF THE FORM 990 WAS PROVIDED TO EVERY BOARD MEMBER. A STAFF MEMBER REVIEWED THE FORM 990 LINE ITEM BY LINE ITEM WITH THE BOARD DURING THIS MEETING.
THE MEMBERS OF THE BOARD ARE REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE CONFLICTS ANNUALLY.

PROFESSIONALS IN PHILANTHROPY, LLC WAS CONTRACTED BY NCF TO COORDINATE AND FACILITATE THE EXECUTIVE SEARCH PROCESS AND COMPENSATION PACKAGE. AS PART OF THIS CONTRACT, PROFESSIONALS IN PHILANTHROPY, LLC RESEARCHED AND REVIEWED NATIONAL AND LOCAL INDUSTRY STANDARDS FOR PRESIDENTS/CEOS OF COMPARABLE SIZE ORGANIZATIONS. SPECIFIC ATTENTION WAS PLACED ON COMMUNITY FOUNDATIONS OF COMPARABLE SIZE AND SOUTHERN NEVADA NONPROFITS AND FOUNDATIONS OF COMPARABLE SIZE. FINDINGS WERE PRESENTED TO THE EXECUTIVE SEARCH COMMITTEE, AND THEY PROVIDED A RECOMMENDATION TO THE NCF BOARD. THE BOARD DISCUSSED AND DELIBERATED THE ENTIRE COMPENSATION PACKAGE INCLUDING BASE SALARY, PERFORMANCE INCENTIVES, AND BENEFITS.
THE COMPENSATION OF THESE INDIVIDUALS IS COMPARED TO AVAILABLE DATA ON COMPENSATION FOR OTHER SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS OF SIMILAR SIZE.

THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE AT THE OFFICES OF NEVADA COMMUNITY FOUNDATION. THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND FORM 990 ARE POSTED ON THE NEVADA COMMUNITY FOUNDATION WEBSITE.
